name: Black Bean Rice Bowl
description: Latin American-inspired vegetarian bowl loaded with protein-rich black beans, rice, and fresh toppings.

instructions.instruction: Cook brown rice according to package directions.
Heat olive oil in a pan. Sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
Add black beans and cumin. Heat through for 3-4 minutes.
Season with salt and half the lime juice.
Prepare fresh salsa: Mix tomato, red onion, cilantro, and remaining lime juice.
Top with seasoned black beans, corn, salsa, and avocado.
Garnish with extra cilantro and lime wedges.

tips: Black beans are an excellent plant-based protein source.
High in fiber for digestive health.
storageInfo: Store beans and rice separately from fresh toppings. Keeps for 4 days.
servingSuggestion: Top with Greek yogurt or sour cream and tortilla chips.
variations: Add grilled chicken for extra protein.
Use cauliflower rice for low-carb version.
